forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 14C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 58F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High around 15C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 59F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low around 50F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. Slight chance of a rain shower. High near 20C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 67F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 54F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 5C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 42F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High around 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High near 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 41F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 11C. ESE winds shifting to NNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 52F. ESE winds shifting to NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening, then fog developing overnight. Low 4C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers tapering off in the evening with foggy conditions overnight. Low around 40F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 11C. E winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 52F. E winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low near 5C. N winds shifting to ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 41F. N winds shifting to ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 11C. SSE winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 52F. SSE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 42F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
